name: Airbag Party(气囊派对)
description:
Air bag party is a completely physics based multiplayer game, a new generation of friends do their best artifact. Players need to flexibly use the wonderful and funny mechanism props in the scene to tease your friends and blow them all out of the sky! In the changing scene, defeat all opponents and become the supreme overlord!

Party Carnival in local / online multiplayer mode

You can compete with your friends at home, or challenge friends all over the world online. Enjoy the embarrassment of your friends and have a carnival full of screams and laughter.

-Real physics, unimaginable joy

Make good use of the mechanism props in the scene and let your friend twist into a twist under the real physical laws, or fly out in circles. Who's not a little smart?
